movie_title: Mr. Garvey Is Your Substitute Teacher - Key & Peele
introduction:
Mr. Garvey is this classâ€™s new substitute teacher, and he is not about to take any of their crap.

P

vocabulary.definition: a person or thing that takes the place of another
vocabulary.example: Mr. Garvey is the substitute teacher for today's class.

vocabulary.definition: the central area of a major city, often associated with poverty and social problems
vocabulary.example: Mr. Garvey taught for 20 years in the inner city.
The whole class felt Mr. Garvey's wrath when their names were mispronounced.

vocabulary.definition: the act of leaving or departing from a place
vocabulary.example: Some students requested an inexodus from the classroom for yearbook photos.
A-Aron was considered insubordinate for not responding promptly to Mr. Garvey.
The principal described the students' behavior as deplorable.
